rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4, 10} and Must be enrolled in course version {2894, 3288, 3469, 4637, E3008, P2001, P3002})
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {PSC1021, PSC1022}

description: Structural Organic Chemistry lays a foundation of knowledge about the structure and reactivity of the key functional groups found in pharmaceutical compounds.  These general topics are relevant to drug design, the synthesis of bioactive molecules, drug-target interactions and drug formulation.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
